channel.title: HEV, Health Chargers at the last room + first encounter Marines + step sounds
channel.description:
When I hold [E], the chargers don't keep charging. I have to repress [E] over and over to charge, incrementally.
It's in the room where you're about to teleport to Xen.
Also, the Marines shout:"Give it up Freeman," or at least, something with "Freeman" in it. This is a minor detail, but I don't think they would have had a priority to kill him, the first time they see him.
Finally, the step sounds you hear after you're landing your feet from a jump sound like at least three hits, as if Gordon has three feet or is a Flamenco dancer.

item.title: HEV, Health Chargers at the last room + first encounter Marines + step sounds
item.dc:creator: Manolito_Mystiq
item.description:
When I hold [E], the chargers don’t keep charging. I have to repress [E] over and over to charge, incrementally.

It’s in the room where you’re about to teleport to Xen.

Also, the Marines shout:“Give it up Freeman,” or at least, something with “Freeman” in it. This is a minor detail, but I don’t think they would have had a priority to kill him, the first time they see him.

Finally, the step sounds you hear after you’re landing your feet from a jump sound like at least three hits, as if Gordon has three feet or is a Flamenco dancer.
